Home

Intimate moments catering is here to make your next event the greatest it can be!
Chef Kevin has been making delectiable items for as long as he can recall.
No event is too small or too big. Chef Kevin also has experience working with other catering firms to allow you, your choice of the best, everything!

About

Chef Kevin started Intimate Moments Catering when he saw a gap in the number of available options for catering on the South Side of Chicago.
Over the years Chef Kevin has catered numerous events from weddings to church functions.
Itimate Moments Caterings offers catering for:

  • Breakfast
  • Brunch
  • Lunch
  • Dinner
  • Special Engagements
